goal.en: "Disasters and problems of soft ground, origin of soft ground, countermeasures in soft ground, soil improvement methods"
goal.ch:
軟弱地盤之問題與災害、軟弱地盤成因、對策工法以及各種地盤改良工法。
目標：瞭解地盤改良工法之原理與應用。

content.en: "Disasters and problems of soft ground, origin of soft ground, countermeasures in soft ground, soil improvement methods"
content.ch:
1.軟弱地盤之問題與災害
2.軟弱地盤之形成與分布
3.對策工法之設計與施工
4.淺層與深層之地盤改良
5.排水改良
6.夯實改良
7.深層攪拌處理
8.藥液灌漿與噴射灌漿
9.冰凍改良

textbook.en:
"Engineering Properties of Ground Modification, Manfred
R. Hausmann, McGraw-Hill, 1990."
textbook.ch:
"1.地盤改良講義
2.地盤改良文獻集
3.軟弱地盤改良工法研究，中華工程公司
4.軟弱地盤改良工法，千田昌平，鹿島出版會
5.地盤改良工法—藥液灌漿施工法設計與施工，台灣營建研究院
6.土與基礎—日本地盤工學會
7.美國FHWA系列技術資料
8.地工技術
9.Engineering Properties of Ground Modification, Manfred
R. Hausmann, McGraw-Hill, 1990.
10.鬆軟地盤改良作業之評估、設計與檢驗方法，財團法人中興
工程顧問社，2003"

grading.ch:
作業：15%
出席：5%
期中考試：40%
期末考試：40%
特殊表現：酌予加分

The Ability in Writing Technical Papers
The Ability in Research, Innovation, and Problem Solving
The Ability of Interdisciplinary Integration and Coordination
International Perspective and Concept of Sustainable Development

en: Department:MSc in Civil Engineering、PhD in Civil Engineering only.
Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementCI3003 only.
ch: 系所:限土木工程學系碩士班、土木工程學系博士班。
